item.title: Lizards playing rock, paper, scissors.
item.description: 1 Rock, paper, scissors 2 Side Blotched Lizards 3 Agent-based modeling div#TOC li { list-style:none; background-image:none; background-repeat:none; background-position:0; } Do it yourself. Don’t use some other guy’s code. The code for the simulations in this article was inspired by this post, which I attempted to recreate and extend. If you want to see the full code for this post then you can find the .Rmd file here.
